import React, {Suspense, useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import ProductInfoForm from '../components/ProductInfoForm.js'; import {fetchProductData} from '../FetchProductApi.js'; const initialResource = fetchProductData(); function ProductDetail() { const [resource, setResource] = useState(initialResource); return (
{resource.product.name}
{resource.product.price}₽
Бренд: {resource.product.brand}
Сезон: {resource.product.season}
console.log("prikol")}>
) } export default ProductDetail;
